node-schema:
<schema xmlns="http://www.palominosys.com/wpschema"> <complexType extends="wpPage" name="wpPage-wpStaffList"> <element name="stafflist" type="wpStaffList" folder="list"/> </complexType>
<complexType name="wpStaffList" edittype="table" icon="group.png" lockable="yes"> <attribute name="id" use="auto" type="wpString" value="stflst"/> <attribute name="name" use="required" type="wpName" /> <attribute name="show-in" use="oneof" value="main,related1,related2,related3,related4,related5" type="wpString"/> <attribute name="listing-style" use="oneof" type="wpString" value="simple,detailed"/> <attribute name="enable-staff-pages" use="oneof" type="wpString" value="yes,no"/> <attribute name="pagination-type" use="oneof" type="wpString" value="list-all,paging"/> <attribute name="sort" use="oneof" type="wpString" value="unsorted, by-firstname, by-lastname" /> <attribute name="sort-order" use="oneof" type="wpString" value="ascending,descending" /> <attribute name="items-per-row" use="oneof" type="wpString" value="1,2,3,4,6,12"/> <attribute name="image-size" use="oneof" type="wpString" value="8.33%,25%,33.33%,50%,100%"/> <attribute name="col-size" use="oneof" type="wpString" value="sm,md,lg"/> <element name="member" type="wpStaffMember" /> </complexType>
<complexType name="wpStaffMember" edittype="sheet" icon="vcard.png" lockable="yes"> <attribute name="id" use="auto" type="wpString" value="stf"/> <attribute name="name" use="required" type="wpString" /> <attribute name="show-in" use="oneof" type="wpString" value="main,related1,related2,related3,related4,related5"/> <attribute name="hidden" use="oneof" type="wpString" value="no,yes"/> <element name="firstname" type="wpString" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="lastname" type="wpString" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="title" type="wpStringL" /> <element name="image" type="wpImage" maxOccurs="1"/> <element name="email" type="wpEmail"/> <element name="phone" type="wpString"/> <element name="fax" type="wpString" /> <element name="summary" type="wpHtml"/> <element name="details" type="wpHtml"/> <element name="linkedin" type="wpString"/> <element name="twitter" type="wpString"/> <element name="facebook" type="wpString"/> <element name="github" type="wpString"/> <element name="tumblr" type="wpString"/> <element name="flickr" type="wpString"/> <element name="youtube" type="wpString"/> </complexType>
</schema>
